title: Mark Zuckerberg on the Elon Musk cage fight
description: The Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg cage match probably wont ever happen.   Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:  Follow on TikTok:   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:   More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to The Vergecast on YouTube, new episodes on Wednesday and Friday:
transcript: Mark, I gotta be honest, not long ago I was thinking we may be doing this as like a post-fight interview in Las Vegas, right outside the octagon, after you get out of a fight with Elon. Maybe next year. Maybe next year? Not not, not Elon. I wanna keep competing, I just need to find somebody who actually -- Do you think he was ever serious about fighting? I don't know, you'd have to ask him. Are there any other tech CEO rivals you'd wanna fight if you could? No, I think it'll be more fun to fight someone who actually fights. So settling tech business rivalries by combat, you don't think that's become like a thing now. I don't think so no, I think generally that's not where our society is heading. Probably for the best. I guess what I'm saying is if he told you, he came back and said "I'll fight on your terms, you pick the venue." Would you still do it? Yeah I just don't think it'll happen. Ok, fair. I agree with you.
